skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: Experience in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for designing and building responsive and interactive interfaces to ensure an engaging user experience.

skills.title: App Development
skills.description: Proficiency in programming languages like Kotlin(Android Dev) and Flutter frameworks for cross-platform development.

skills.title: UI & UX Design
skills.description: I have experience working with Canva and Photoshop, a graphic design platform, where I utilized its tools and features to create visually appealing graphics for various projects.

skills.title: Database Management System
skills.description: Managed and maintained a MySQL database for a web application, including tasks such as schema design, indexing and backup and recovery.

portfolio.title: Machinery App
portfolio.description: Designed and published the Machinery App for a startup I worked for. Worked with the app development team to identify, prioritize, and fix bugs during testing of the app.

portfolio.title: Weather App
portfolio.description: It is an application that provides users with up-to-date weather information for their current location or any specified location. It provides detailed information such as temperature, humidity and wind speed/direction etc.

portfolio.title: Portfolio Website
portfolio.description: It is a website to showcase my skills, projects, and experience to potential employers or clients. It summarizes my professional experience and key achievements.
